title: Sometimes a RecyclerView will need to use several types of Views to be displayed in the list shown in the UI, and each View needs a different layout xml to be inflated.

inline_content.Text: Sometimes a RecyclerView will need to use several types of Views to be displayed in the list shown in the UI, and each View needs a different layout xml to be inflated.

title: For this issue, you may use different ViewHolders in single Adapter, by using a special method in RecyclerView -
getItemViewType(int position)
